#include<bits/stdc++.h>


using namespace std;

#define M 1000000007
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
	
	ll t;
	cin>>t;
	
for(ll l=1;l<=t;l++)	
{

	ll n;
		cin>>n;
		
		
ll a[n+1];
	for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		a[i]=i;
		a[i]=a[i]%M;
	}
		
		for(ll j=2;j<=n;j++)
		{
			
			for(ll i=1;i<=n-j+1;i++  )
			{
				
				a[i]=a[i]+a[i+1];
				
				a[i]=a[i]%M;
			}
			
			
			
			
		}
		
		
		
		cout<<"Case "<<l<<": "<<a[1]<<endl;
		
		
	//	    printf("Case %lld: 1\n",a[1]);
		
	}
	
	
	return 0;
}
